contract_details.description: Comprehensive import optimization mission focusing on cleaning up import statements, eliminating unused imports, implementing lazy loading for heavy modules, and optimizing dependency management for better performance.
contract_details.background: Agent-1 has demonstrated expertise in performance optimization. This contract leverages that expertise to optimize import patterns and dependency management across the entire codebase.
objectives: Analyze all import statements across the codebase
Eliminate unused and redundant import statements
Implement lazy loading for heavy module imports
Optimize import order and organization patterns
Create import optimization guidelines and standards
Implement conditional imports for optional dependencies
Document import patterns and best practices
Validate import optimizations don't break functionality
deliverables: Comprehensive import analysis and optimization report
Cleaned up import statements across all modules
Lazy loading implementation for heavy dependencies
Conditional import patterns for optional features
technical_requirements: Code analysis frameworks for dependency detection
Lazy loading and dynamic import frameworks
Performance profiling tools for import timing
success_criteria: Import statements optimized across all modules
Lazy loading implemented for heavy modules
Conditional imports implemented for optional features
Import optimization guidelines documented and followed
Zero functionality regressions from import changes

dependencies: Codebase analysis completed for import patterns
resources_required: Code analysis frameworks for dependency detection
Lazy loading and dynamic import libraries

network_unlocks: Access to Import Optimization Working Group

contract_history.details: Created import optimization and cleanup contract for Agent-1 (Medium Priority)
